column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Good service. We ordered the crispy shrimp balls that were so salty
column2: they were inedible and our waitress brought us the salmon sashimi that was wayyyyy better. Be warned that you may sit at a communal table and rub shoulders with a stranger; I know some people may have a problem with this. As far as the ramen goes
column3: it wasn't for me. It was good
column4: but I had never had it before and I was primarily motivated by my love for Naruto. The ramen seasoning at the table does improve the ramen considerably.
